transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji Ashu ji.
Hello.
Hello.
Madam kya aap to bhul hi gaye payment leke. Pagal samajh kya humko aapne. Sir. Are madam kal aapne mere ko kya bola video mix karne ke liye. Thik hai main abhi mera hisab se dekhta hu. Main nahi main abhi just training me thi main aapko. Chalega madam. Thik hai main mera hisab se dekhta hu thik hai. 
Okay madam.
summary:

- Payment not received after taking it.

- Accusation of considering the customer foolish.

- Video mixing request.

- The speaker says they will handle it themselves.
